text: Kapherara bale, amara kakhana'o e kora'ane bisbasa karaba na ebam era purbabarti kitabe'o naya. Apani yadi papisthaderake dekhatena, yakhana taderake tadera palanakartara samane damra karano habe, , takhana tara paraspara katha katakati karabe. Yaderake durbala mane kara hata, tara ahankariderake balabe, tomara na thakale amara abasya'i mumina hatama.
